civilian_title: Commissioned officers of the Canadian Armed Forces
role_description: Plans and leads armoured fighting vehicle operations and integrates reconnaissance intelligence for battle group commanders.

civilian_title: Non-commissioned ranks of the Canadian Armed Forces
role_description: Provides close combat capabilities, tactical security, and small-unit leadership in austere environments.

civilian_title: Air traffic controllers and related occupations
role_description: Maintains airspace surveillance, coordinates aircraft movements, and relays critical flight information from control centres.

civilian_title: Computer engineers (except software engineers and designers)
role_description: Designs, deploys, and safeguards tactical and strategic communications networks for CAF operations.

civilian_title: Other technical occupations in air traffic control and related operations
role_description: Operates shipboard sensors, fuses radar tracks, and briefs command teams on maritime situational awareness.
